product.title: EVICIV 10.1 Inch Raspberry Pi Case Tactile Display Housing Portable Monitor RasPi TouchScreen USB C Raspbery Kit Pi4 Accessories
product.description:
Unboxing

for Raspberry Pi 10 Inch Touch Screen Case


















PRODUCT:

10.1 Inch Raspberry Pi TouchScreen RPI 2 3 4 Model B Case Housing EVICIV UPi06 Max Portable Monitor RasPi USB C Tactile Display

UPi06 Max UNIQUE FEATURES:

- 3-STEPS SIMPLE INSTALLATION: 3 mini boards are designed to replace HDMI/mini HDMI cable and USB-C Power Cable. 2 touch cables (plug in or soldered alternative) designed for both beginner and engineer. Total 3 steps you can fully install your Raspberry Pi to UPi06.

- 1-CABLE EASY CONNECTION: After the installation, you only need to power up UPi06 with one cable which includes in the package.

- PORTRAIT MODE TOUCH ROTATION: With UPi06 you can Rotate the Touch Function to 90°/180°/270° in the menu WITHOUT changing any configuration file.

- MULTIPLE USE VESA & HOLDER STAND: Place UPi06 wherever you like with an 80° back holder stand and VESA support.

- BUILT-IN COOLING SYSTEM: 2 way In and Out air vent with built-in cooling fan, keep the heat out continuously while refilling with cool air, keeps your Raspberry Pi working in a lower temperature.

Other FEATURES:

- MONITOR WITH DURABLE & HARD-WEARING CASE: Protects your Raspberry Pi 10.1" Touchscreen and board, improves its appearance, while keeping the board neatly tucked away behind it. Its rugged bezel with edge-to-edge glass makes it very suitable for applications like tabletop integration. The display supports rear VESA and external mounting brackets for multiple mounting options.

- IPS 178° ULTRA-WIDE VIEW ANGLES: Features a 16:9 aspect ratio LED-backlit panel with a 178° horizontal and vertical ultra-wide view angle that minimizes color shift on both horizontal and vertical planes to ensure quality visuals from almost any direction. It delivers improved color accuracy plus increased energy efficiency.

- PRECISE & ACCURATE 10-POINTS TOUCH: Projected capacitive (PCAP) touch technology delivers super-fast, sensitive touch response with excellent dragging performance and perfect picture quality. ten-point multi-touch support lets you unlock the power of today's touch-enabled applications.

- VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY: With USB Type-C connectivity you can efficiently transfer data, and power up your device through a single cable. Plus, expanded inputs with an adjustable stand make this display a desktop powerhouse. This monitor also features HD and a 3.5mm headphone jack for plug-and-play connectivity to a variety of multimedia devices.

- ERGONOMIC MOUNTING DESIGN: You can minimize bad posture or wrist strain and make the most of the EVICIV monitor's great picture quality and touch interaction. You can also choose to mount your monitor on the wall, so you can enjoy even greater viewing flexibility and allowing you to place it easily in tight spaces.

- ENHANCED 60HZ REFRESH RATE: Standard 60Hz provides a sharp view and smooth gaming experience.

- MULTI-LANGUAGE MENU: The screen supports multiple language menu, help you to set up your screen easily.

- WIDELY COMPATIBLE WITH ALL OPERATING SYSTEM: Supports Raspbian, Linux, Ubuntu, Windows, Android, Debian, Kali, Kodi etc.

SPECIFICATIONS:

NAME:
- BRAND:
- ITEM: 10.1-inch RPi Touchscreen Case
- MODEL: UPi06 Max
- MATERIAL: ABS

SCREEN:
- REFRESH RATE: 60Hz
- SCREEN SIZE: 7 inch
- RESOLUTION: 1366*768 (FWXGA)
- DISPLAY RATIO: 16:9
- VIEWING ANGLE: 178 degree
- SCREEN TYPE: WLED
- PANEL TYPE: IPS
- CONTRAST RATIO: 1000:1
- BRIGHTNESS: 400cd/m2
- COLOR GAMUT: 85% sRGB
- VIEWABLE AREA: 217*136mm (8.54*5.35inch)

PHYSICIAL:
- INTERFACE 1: 1*HDMI, 1*3.5mm aux
- INTERFACE 2: 1*Type C (Display input support Thunderbolt 3 and USB 3.1)
- INPUT POWER: 12V2A
- PHYSICAL BUTTONS: 5 buttons, 1*Power, 1*Menu, 1*Down, 1*Up, 1*Exit.

ADVANCED:
- TOUCH SCREEN: Yes, 10 points multi-touch capacitive screen
- GRAVITY SENSOR: No, Manually Rotate Touch Control
- BUILT-IN SPEAKERS: Yes, 2 speakers
- VESA: Yes, 4 holes for M4 screws
- DRIVER FREE: Yes
- STAND HOLDER: Yes, 80 degree foldable stand
- BACK COVER: Yes, Rigid Raspaberry Pi Case
- WARRANTY: 1 Years

PACKAGE:
- PRODUCT SIZE: 245*160*40.4mm (9.65*6.3*1.59inch)
- NET WEIGHT: 0.42*kg (0.93*lbs)
- PACKAGE SIZE: 276*210*55mm (10.87*8.27*2.17inch)
- PACKAGE WEIGHT: 0.95*kg (2.09*lbs)

COMPATIBLE:
- COMPATIBLE 1: for Xbox One S X/PS4 Pro 2 3/Switch/Raspberry Pi 2 3 4 Zero
- COMPATIBLE 2: for Windows XP 7 8 10/macOS 9 10/Linux/Ubuntu/Android/IOS
- COMPATIBLE 3: for iPhone/Samsung/Huawei Mate Honor/Xiaomi/OPPO/OnePlus

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?

1 * UPi06 10.1-inch Touchscreen Case
1 * HDMI to HDMI Cable
1 * USB-C to USB-C Cable
1 * USB-A to USB-C Cable
1 * Wall Charger
1 * Manual

ADVANCED KITS:

1 * Touch Cable with USB-A
1 * Touch Cable for soldering
2 * Side Panel (PI4 Side Panel for RPi 4, PI3 Side Panel for RPi 2/3)
2 * HDMI Board (HDMI-D Board for RPi 4, HDMI-A Board for RPi 2/3)
2 * Power Board (Type C Board for RPi 4, Micro USB Board for RPi 2/3)
1 * Screw Driver with Screws (4 Screws for RPi, 4 Screws for Back Cover)

for Xbox One S X/PS4 Pro 2 3/Switch/Raspberry Pi 2 3 4 Zero
